/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.user.repository.UserMapper.selectListUserByDept */ select view.user_id , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.user_nm_kg,view.user_nm_ru,view.user_nm_kg,#{lang}) as user_nm , view.dept_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.dept_nm_kg,view.dept_nm_ru,view.dept_nm_kg,#{lang}) as dept_nm , view.email , view.gen_cd , view.job_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(cc.code_nm1,cc.code_nm2,cc.code_nm1,#{lang}) as job_nm , view.pos_cd , view.age_cd , view.cmit_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.cmit_nm_kg,view.cmit_nm_ru,view.cmit_nm_kg,#{lang}) as cmit_nm , view.poly_cd , view.poly_nm from kgst.view_user_member view left join com_code_detail cc on cc.code_id = view.job_cd left join com_ccof cf on cf.user_id = view.user_id where 1=1
AND (view.dept_cd = #{deptCd} OR view.poly_cd = #{deptCd} OR view.cmit_cd = #{deptCd} or cf.dept_cd = #{deptCd})

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.user.repository.UserMapper.userDetail */ select view.user_id , view.user_nm_kg , view.user_nm_ru , view.dept_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.dept_nm_kg,view.dept_nm_ru,view.dept_nm_kg,#{lang}) as dept_nm , view.email , view.gen_cd , view.job_cd , view.msg_rcv_yn , kgst.fngetlangnm(cc.code_nm1,cc.code_nm2,cc.code_nm1,#{lang}) as user_nm , view.pos_cd , view.age_cd , view.cmit_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.cmit_nm_kg,view.cmit_nm_ru,view.cmit_nm_kg,#{lang}) as cmit_nm , view.poly_cd , view.poly_nm , cm.mbl_no , (case when view.user_id in (select cu.user_id from com_user cu) then 'user' when view.member_id in (select comm.member_id from com_member comm) then 'member' end) as type , view.profile_img_path from kgst.view_user_member view left join com_code_detail cc on cc.code_id = view.job_cd left join com_member cm on cm.member_id = view.user_id where view.user_id = #{userId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.user.repository.UserMapper.selectUser */ select cu.seq , cu.dept_cd --부서코드 , cu.email --이메일 , cu.gen_cd --성별(M,F) , cu.profile_img_path --프로필이미지경로 , cu.job_Cd --직급코드 , cu.msg_rcv_yn --메세지수신여부 , cu.pos_cd , cu.user_id --직원아이디 , cu.user_nm_kg --이름(키르키즈어) , cu.user_nm_ru --이름(러시아어) , cu.dept_head_yn --부서장여부 , cu.doc_mgr_yn --문서관리자여부 , cu.reg_id , cu.reg_dt , cu.mod_id , cu.mod_dt , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1,cd.dept_nm2,cd.dept_nm_3,#{lang}) as dept_nm from com_user cu inner join com_dept cd on cd.dept_cd = cu.dept_cd where seq = #{seq}
